text: Hey there! My name is João, but you can call me Jay or p1pa!

I'm a full-stack software developer with three years of experience. I mainly use TypeScript to build clean, performant applications. My go-to stack is React & Node, paired with frameworks like Next and Express, and tools such as Docker and Git.

I'm highly adaptable and have built many transferable skills that enable me to participate in all steps of the product development cycle. These include problem-solving, effective communication, and work on agile methodologies.
